definition: Attributes that describe qualities, characteristics, or technical properties of media content like music, recordings, or visual material.

positive_examples: This album is classified as progressive rock genre.
The recording was made in stereo with high fidelity.
The photographer used a low-angle shot for dramatic effect.
The sound quality is characterized by crystal clear reproduction.
This compilation album features various artists from the jazz genre.
The recording attributes include the studio location and equipment used.
negative_examples: The book has 300 pages and hardcover binding.
The building is 50 feet tall with brick construction.
She has brown hair and green eyes.
The car has four doors and leather seats.
The recipe calls for two cups of flour.
The relationship between the characters developed slowly.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: PhysicalAttribute, TemporalAttribute, SpatialAttribute, PersonalAttribute, QuantitativeAttribute
